bib.title: Link recommendation method based on web content and usage mining
bib.author: Kazienko, Przemys{\l}aw and Kiewra, Maciej
bib.venue: Intelligent Information Processing and Web Mining
bib.abstract: Hyperlink recommendation overcomes the problem of quick and easy access to information in web systems. A method that integrates web usage and content mining was proposed and examined in this paper. Potentially interesting documents are prompted to the user on the
bib.booktitle: Intelligent Information Processing and Web Mining
